name: Unrivaled in the World of Superpowers
author: 三昧漫画
content: The peerless cultivator, Shangguan Yun, unexpectedly lands in a world brimming with beings endowed with superpowers. Despite his initial intentions to adapt and live a serene life, he is continuously confronted with challenges. However, none of these opponents are a match for his prowess. Revered as the strongest, Shangguan Yun advises, “Mortals, cease your futile struggles!”
